maqras.text: 87|1|Apani apanara sumahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna [1]
87|2|yini [1] srsti karena [2] atahpara suthama karena [3].
87|3|Ara yini nirdharana karena [1] atahpara pathanirdesa karena [2]
87|4|ara yini trnadi utpanna karena [1]
87|5|pare ta dhusara abarjanaya parinata karena.
87|6|Sighra'i amara apanake patha karaba, phale apani bhulabena na [1]
87|7|allah ya icche karena ta chara [1]. Niscaya tini janena ya prakasya o ya gopaniya.
87|8|Ara amara apanara jan'ya sugama kare deba sahaja patha [1].
87|9|Atahpara upadesa yadi phalaprasu haya tabe upadesa dina [1]
87|10|ye bhaya kare se'i upadesa grahana karabe [1].
87|11|Ara ta upeksa karabe ye nitanta hatabhagya
87|12|ye bhayabaha agune dagdha habe
87|13|tarapara sekhane se marabe'o na bamcabe'o na [1].
87|14|Abasya'i saphalya labha karabe ye parisud'dha haya [1].
87|15|Ebam tara rabera nama smarana kare o salata kayema kare [1].
87|16|Kintu tomara duniyara jibanake pradhan'ya da'o
87|17|athaca akhirata'i utkrsta [1] o sthayi [2].
87|18|Niscaya eta ache purbabarti sahiphasamuhe
87|19|ibrahima o musara sahiphasamuhe [1].
88|1|Apanara kache ki acchannakarira (kiyamatera) sambada eseche
88|2|sedina aneka cehara habe abanata [1]
88|3|klista, klanta [1]
88|4|tara prabesa karabe jbalanta agune [1]
88|5|taderake atyanta usna prasrabana theke pana karano habe
88|6|tadera jan'ya khadya thakabe na kamtayukta gulma chara [1]
88|7|ya taderake pusta karabe na ebam tadera ksudha nibrtta karabe na.
88|8|Aneka mukhamandala sedina habe anandojjbala
88|9|nijedera kajera saphalye paritrpta [1]
88|10|su'ucca jannate
88|11|sekhane tara asara bakya sunabe na [1]
88|12|sekhane thakabe bahamana prasrabana
88|13|sekhane thakabe unnata [1] sayyasamuha
88|14|ara prastuta thakabe panapatra
88|15|sari sari upadhana
88|16|ebam bichana galica
88|17|tabe ki tara takiye dekhe na utera dike, kibhabe ta srsti kara hayeche
88|18|ebam asamanera dike, kibhabe ta urdhbe sthapana kara hayeche
88|19|ebam parbatamalara dike, kibhabe ta pratisthita kara hayeche
88|20|ebam bhutalera dike, kibhabe ta bistrta kara hayeche [1]
88|21|ata'eba apani upadesa dina; apani to kebala ekajana upadesa data [1]
88|22|apani tadera upara sakti prayogakari nana.
88|23|Tabe ke'u mukha phiriye nile o kuphari karale
88|24|allah taderake debena mahasasti [1].
88|25|Niscaya tadera phire asa amadera'i kache
88|26|tarapara tadera hiseba-nikesa amadera'i kaja.
89|1|Sapatha phajarera [1]
89|2|sapatha dasa ratera [1]
89|3|sapatha jora o bejorera [1]
89|4|sapatha ratera yakhana ta gata haye thake –[1]—
89|5|niscaya'i era madhye sapatha rayeche bodhasampanna byaktira jan'ya [1].
89|6|Apani dekhenani apanara raba ki (acarana) karechilena ‘ada bansera
89|7|irama gotrera prati [1]--- yara adhikari chila su'ucca prasadera
89|8|yara samatulya kono dese srsti kara hayani [1]
89|9|Ebam samudera prati?- Yara upatyakaya [1] pathara kete ghara nirmana karechila
89|10|ebam kilaka'oyala phira‘a'unera prati [1]
89|11|yara dese simalanghana karechila
89|12|atahpara sekhane asanti brd'dhi karechila.
89|13|Phale apanara raba tadera upara sastira kasaghata hanalena.
89|14|Niscaya apanara raba satarka drsti rakhena [1].
89|15|Manusa to erupa ye, tara raba yakhana take pariksa karena sam'mana o anugraha dana kare, takhana se bale, ‘amara raba amake sam'manita karechena [1].’
89|16|Ara yakhana take pariksa karena tara riyka sankucita kare, takhana se bale, ‘amara raba amake hina karechena.’
89|17|Kakhano naya [1]. Baram [2] tomara iyatimake sam'mana kara na
89|18|ebam tomara misakinake khadyadane parasparake utsahita kara na [1]
89|19|ara tomara uttaradhikarera sampada sampurnarupe kheye phela [1]
89|20|ara tomara dhana-sampada khuba'i bhalabasa [1]
89|21|kakhano naya [1]. Yakhana yaminake curna- bicurna kara habe [2]
89|22|ara yakhana apanara raba agamana karabena o saribad'dhabhabe pherestagana'o [1]
89|23|ara sedina jahannamake ana habe [1], sedina manusa smarana karabe, takhana e smarana tara ki kaje asabe [2]
89|24|se balabe, ‘haya! Amara e jibanera jan'ya ami yadi kichu agrima pathatama?”
89|25|Sedina tamra sastira mata sasti ke'u dite parabe na
89|26|ebam tamra bamdhara mata bamdhate ke'u parabe na.
89|27|He prasanta atma
89|28|tumi tomara rabera kache phire asa santusta o santosabhajana haye [1]
89|29|atahpara amara bandadera antarbhukta ha'o [1]
89|30|ara amara jannate prabesa kara.
